results.title: Pablo Casals breaks his journey
results.creator_credit: V.R. Sarma, Thorold Dickinson and United Nations. Film Board
results.brief_description: Casals broke his self-imposed retirement to appear in New York at the International Concert celebrating the United Nations’ 13 Anniversary. Casals gave a brief talk on the contribution musicians can make to world peace and played the short Catalan air “Song of the Birds”.
results.creator_credit_for_label: V.R. Sarma, Thorold Dickinson and United Nations. Film Board

results.title: The Oxyacetylene flame: master of metals
results.brief_description: Explains the principles of the oxyacetylene welding torch and illustrates the tuypes of work it will perfomr. Shows how acetylene is produced from carbide manufactured from limestone and coke and how this gas is burnt with oxygen manufactured from the air. The regulation of gases in the torch is explained and welding, brazing and cutting techniques are demonstrated. Contains animated segments to illustrate use of equipment.

results.title: Outline of activity sampling
results.brief_description: Uses a petrol station to show, stage by stage, how the technique of activity sampling can be employed to give a reliable picture of what is happening; a picture that can then be used as the basis for improved methods of work.

results.title: Out here
results.creator_credit: Ross Landers and Warrnambool (Vic.). Early Childhood Development Complex
results.brief_description: Shows some of the services of the Early Childhood Development Complex, Warrnambool, which provides for children both normal and handicapped, who would otherwise suffer from isolation in Victoria’s south-west region. Services include loans of toys and books, a travelling medical service, a Family Day Care group, and a support group for handicapped children and their parents.

results.title: Out
results.creator_credit: Thorold Dickinson and United Nations. Film Board
results.brief_description: A documentary report on a people’s flight to freedom and of the problems Hungarian escapees face in finding a new home and a new land. Shot in Austria by UN cameramen, the film contains scenes of actual escapes across the border. The film is a moving document, telling the story of a mother and two boys and their search for a new homeland. Powerful and dramatic use of music which was recorded in one of the ninety refugee camps in Austria and haunting images combine to capture the danger and the desperation faced by these people.

results.title: Our wonderful body: medicines, drugs and poisons
results.brief_description: Offers such safety guidelines as the importance of reading labels, following a doctor’s recommendation and the storage of drugs, medicines and household chemicals away from children. Suitable for upper primary level.

results.title: Our inheritance from historic Greece
results.brief_description: Illustrates aspects of modern everyday life which can be traced back to that of the ancient Greeks. Aspects discussed are architecture, dress, ideas such as democracy, word derivations, electricity, zoology, mathematics and botany. Each element is depicted in its present-day use as well as its ancient Greek origin.
